content: Singtel Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Jun 2018What do you think of Singtel (SGX: Z74)? Is it good time to buy now?3 answersAnswerBump0

Dwivid SharmaLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 17 Aug 2018Yes, It is good time to buy Singtel. Yesterday, I have read a blog Top 5 Singapore Stocks to Buy Now! and it contains Singtel in their list of stocks. As per my analysis it is alost near to it low for this year and as we know that It has potential to give good return on investment. ​​0 comments1

Goh Kah KiatLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 12 Jun 2018This is very much a question of your risk appetite and objective. Are you looking for growth? Or income?​From a fundamental perspective, I feel that the dividend is very much sustainable and it can be a good income stock for the dividend investor. Growth wise, not that much.​A key question for you is whether you think competition is going to be as bad as what people think its going to be, and if 5% yield is enough for you to stomach the volatility.​FYI I'm vested in Singtel, but do your own due diligence before you buy.0 comments1

Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 12 Jun 2018Do you think Singtel can survive amidst the competition?​Can it still command high consumer pricing? Or is it a price war?​Is it still a viable business?​Are its overseas expansions viable and makes sense?​Can it sustain the dividends payout?​If you buy now, are you able to tolerate further drops in its share price?​These are only a few questions to ask yourself before buying, got alot more questions but I lazy type all....0 comments0
